org.springframework.kafka.support.serializer

Class JsonSerializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.kafka.support.serializer.JsonSerializer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - class of the entity, representing messages
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.ExtendedSerializer<T>, org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.Serializer<T>

    public class JsonSerializer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.ExtendedSerializer<T>
    Generic Serializer for sending Java objects to Kafka as JSON.
    Author:
    Igor Stepanov, Artem Bilan, Gary Russell, Elliot Kennedy
